common.hello: By continuing you agree to our Terms of Conditions and Privacy Policy

changeLang.title: Select Language
changeLang.infoText: Select your preferred language from the list below. Changing the language will update the app's display language to enhance your experience.

agreeDialog.infotext: Welcome to Pushpamala App. Our aim is to connect more than 1 crore Hindus. To cover the costs of servers, maintenance, support and development we are displaying advertisements in the app. Please give us your consent by clicking 'Agree'.
agreeDialog.noticeText: We do not store any media on our servers. Our platform only lists content that is publicly available on the internet. If you have any copyright concerns, please contact us at abc@gmail.com.

welcome.infoText: Here, you can enjoy devotion, aartis, and bhajans. Let’s begin this spiritual journey and share your reverence for God.

login.enterMobileText: Enter your phone number and we will send an OTP to continue

home.greeting: Start your day with the blessings of God.

updateDialog.title: पुष्पमाला का नया अपडेट उपलब्ध
updateDialog.discription: <text>अब सुनें नए <bold>भजन और आरतियाँ</bold>, करें लाइव दर्शन और पूजा बुकिंग पहले से भी आसान। <bold>बेहतर प्रदर्शन और नई सुविधाओं का आनंद लेने के लिए आज ही अपडेट करें!</bold></text>
updateDialog.info: नए फीचर्स के साथ आपकी भक्ति यात्रा को और भी खास बनाया गया है।
